short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record income and expenses. This can then be exported to a PDF for record keeping.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this extension to keep track of income and expenses without a spreadsheet. All data is saved locally within the local memory. Allows further to export to PDF for record keeping.

Button descriptions:
Add - adds an income or expense to the table
Del - removes an income or expense from the table
Clear - clears the table of all existing incomes or expenses
Save - saves the current table to local memory
Export - takes the data in the table and allows saving to PDF.

Any updates within the extension will display an output message for easy confirmation / troubleshooting.
